original_text: They must wear linen cloths around their heads. The trousers that they wear next to their skin must also be made of linen. They must not tie anything around their body that makes them sweat.
korean_text: 가는 베 관을 머리에 쓰며 가는 베 바지를 입고 땀이 나게 하는 것으로 허리를 동이지 말 것이며

sentences.original_text: They must wear linen cloths around their heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 머리 주위에 아마 천을 입어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: The trousers that they wear next to their skin
must also be made of linen
They must not tie anything around their body
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 몸 주위에 아무것도 묶어서는 안 됩니다
